summary: Profile: Middle School/Secondary English Language Arts teacher dedicated to nurturing and inspiring students through literature, history, biblical reflection, and creative Christian interpretation. Seeks to challenge learners to engage the world through dynamic dialogue and to discover who they are called to be, guiding them to find their place in the world.

experience.title: Sixth Grade English Language Arts Teacher
experience.description: Instructed English Language Arts for a diverse population including students with special needs and intellectual gifts. Planned lessons, collaborated across Professional Learning Communities, and communicated regularly with parent/guardians.

experience.title: Sixth Grade English Language Arts Teacher
experience.description: Instructed English Language Arts for a diverse population of students with special needs and intellectual gifts. Planned lessons and collaborated with colleagues through regular team and content-area meetings. Communicated with parent/guardians.

experience.title: Pastoral Care Ministerial Internship
experience.description: Internship in pastoral services counseling in the HIV/AIDS clinic. Assisted in gathering data and information for a grant and publications. Created materials and program for education local congregations about HIV/AIDS.

experience.title: Ministerial Intern
experience.description: Given charge of youth group activities and spiritual education. Planned and conducted an educational mission trip to Washington, D.C. Planned weekly and monthly activities for spiritual and social growth of the youth. Instructed and counseled youth on religious and social issues.

experience.title: Substitute Teacher
experience.description: Several months as a substitute for a teacher assistant in a Behavioral Disorder and Special Needs classroom. Responsible for a 4th Grade class at Lake Ridge Elementary School during a teacher's brief leave of absence for a family emergency. Taught and observed in nearly every grade from Kindergarten to High School.

experience.title: Teaching English to Non-Native Speakers (ELL-Instructor) & Camp Counselor
experience.description: Develop teaching materials and programing for an "Intensive English Holiday Package." Create individualized lesson plans for students with varied English competencies. Assist students with English pronunciation and syntax. Supervised students excursions and guided conversation in English.

education.degree: Education Program in Teacher Licensing, Middle School Lateral Entry
Bachelor of Arts in History & English

certifications: Teaching License: Middle School Lateral Entry (NC Teach)
Middle School English Language Arts Certification (NC)
